course_description: Introduction to caregiving dimensions of ministry through theological and psycho-social analysis of personal, family, and congregational need, and on principles and methods of care in response to them. Prerequisite for other pastoral care courses. (Introductory Arts of Ministry) (PC501CE when offered as a Contextualized Introductory Arts of Ministry course with Con Ed I)
